questions.question: What is the predominant color of the device's visible exterior?
What is the overall shape of the device's primary body?
What type of cooling mechanism is visibly integrated into the device?
What material appears to constitute the majority of the device's casing?

How many visible rubber feet support the device's base?
What kind of connector is visible on the back of the device?
Describe the pattern of the visible ventilation holes on the top?
What is the shape of the visible cooling fan?
Is the surface texture predominantly smooth or ridged?
What kind of label or marking is visible on the device's back?
What is the visible configuration of the ventilation slots?

What is the apparent build quality of the device, high or low?
